snippet: Testifying at his murder trial, the athlete Oscar Pistorius said he and his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, had enjoyed a cozy evening together before it all went wrong.
abstract: South African Paralympic athlete Oscar Pistorius removes his prosthetic legs and demonstrates at his murder trial how vulnerable and exposed he can be without them; demonstration goes toward bolstering defense's case that Pistorius shot his gun in a panic, accidentally killing his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp, because he believed someone had broken into his house.

byline.contributor: Dan Bilefsky contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Testifying at his murder trial, the athlete Oscar Pistorius said he and his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp, had enjoyed a cozy evening together before it all went wrong.

headline.main: Tearful Drama as Pistorius Says He Panicked
headline.print_headline: Tearful Drama as Pistorius Says He Panicked
